response.name: 200 - List layouts

request.description: Returns user's addresses. This endpoint is called from user's profile (Dashboard / Profile / My profile).

response.name: 200 - Get layout

request.description:
This endpoint is called from user's profile (Dashboard / Profile / My profile) when creating new address.

### Request Body Parameters

| **Name** | **Type** | **Required** | **Description** |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| type | ENUM | yes | \[ENUM\] Address |
| main | bool | no | True if address is main for communication, only one address can be main |
| address_line_1 | string | yes |  |
| address_line_2 | string | no |  |
| city | string | yes |  |
| district | string | no |  |
| postal_code | string | yes |  |
| country | ENUM | yes | \[ENUM\] Country |
